titleStmt.title: A gloryous medytacyon of Ihesus crystes passyon

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by me Rychard Fakes dwellynge in Dura[m] Rent, or ells in Poules by the yearde at the sygne, of the. ABC,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; place of publication and estimated publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
